name: godbot
updateMsg1: 4.12 Added the >makevote command, and I can now choose singular/plural correctly for some prompts.
updateMsg2: 4.11 Fixed several chatContest bugs and chatCombos now won't reset anymore when the bot restarts. Improved logging for gold updates.
updateMsg3: 4.11 Games generated with the >minesweeper command will now start with one unvealed zero.
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
